tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MentorshipPrograms (
    program_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    mentor_id INT,
    mentee_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE mentorship_programs (
    program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    program_description TEXT,
    program_start_date DATE,
    program_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE mentorship_participants (
    participant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    participant_email VARCHAR(255),
    program_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (program_id) REFERENCES mentorship_programs(program_id)
);

CREATE TABLE mentors (
    mentor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mentor_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mentor_experience INT,
    mentor_profession VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE mentees (
    mentee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mentee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mentee_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mentee_field VARCHAR(255),
    mentee_interests TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mentorship_programs (
    program_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    program_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    program_description TEXT,
    mentor_id UUID REFERENCES mentors(mentor_id),
    mentee_id UUID REFERENCES mentees(mentee_id),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE mentorship_programs (
    mentor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentee_id INT,
    program_title TEXT,
    program_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE mentors (
    mentor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_name TEXT,
    mentor_email TEXT,
    mentor_expertise TEXT,
    mentor_location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mentees (
    mentee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentee_name TEXT,
    mentee_email TEXT,
    mentee_interests TEXT,
    mentee_career_goals TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE mentorship_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id INT,
    mentee_id INT,
    request_status TEXT,
    request_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MentorshipPrograms (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id UUID,
    mentee_id UUID,
    program_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Mentees (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    field_of_study VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE MentorshipRequests (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id UUID,
    mentee_id UUID,
    request_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE MenteeProgress (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mentee_id UUID,
    program_id UUID,
    progress_percentage INT,
    feedback TEXT
);
